status_legend.0: Normal Operation - The turbine is in normal power production mode
status_legend.1: Derated Operation - Derated power generation with a power restriction
status_legend.2: Idling - Asset is idling and waits to operate again
status_legend.3: Service - Asset is in service mode / service team is at the site
status_legend.4: Downtime - Asset is down due a fault or other reasons

summary: Over this 6‑hour window the turbine operated continuously in Normal Operation across all 37 ten‑minute intervals, delivering very stable, near‑rated power (power_mean 0.9726 with low variability) alongside low rotor and generator speed variability. Wind conditions were generally steady (mean ~15 m/s, low std) with at least one brief higher‑wind episode (max 28.1 m/s), while average pitch (~9.53) and yaw misalignment (~8.93) stayed elevated. Operationally, the period is characterized by persistently elevated temperatures (temp_mean ~65.23) and a consistently negative power residual (mean −0.0836), indicating power was below expectation on average for the observed conditions.
